title: Covenant
lyrics:
We started so sure, with nothing to hide
A little naive, a little
Running into the future hand-in-hand
We didn't hear the truth
We didn't believe

That love could be a shade that turns to jealousy

Now our hearts break just from a wandering glance



Fear comes in the dead of night

When I look into your eyes

Wonder if you felt a spark

With someone else when we're apart

But it's alright, it's alright

We trust our love is

We trust our love is

Covenant



I know it sounds crazy to say we can feel

Things for other people if our love is real

But to choose our love makes it stronger in the end



Fear comes in the dead of night

When I look into your eyes

Wonder if you felt a spark

With someone else when we're apart

But it's alright, it's alright

We trust our love is

We trust our love is

Covenant



Fear comes in the dead of night

And you look into my eyes

Wonder if I felt a spark

With someone else when we're apart

But it's alright, it's alright

We trust our love is

We trust our love is

Covenant



I won't run when it hurts

I won't run from the moments of doubt

I've given you all of me

I don't care what it costs, I'll never leave

I won't run when it hurts

I won't run from the moments of doubt

I've given you all of me

I don't care what it costs, I'll never leave



Fear comes in the dead of night

When I look into your eyes

Wonder if you felt a spark

With someone else when we're apart

But it's alright, it's alright

We trust our love is

We trust our love is

Covenant
